My designs have helped my employers win awards, and brought in millions of dollars in sales. Love to write content and present solutions.

references.name: Tim Stern
references.reference: John brings a combination of technical and business savvy that is difficult to find in the same person.  He is equally comfortable presenting to a business audience as he is when he's hands-on in a lab/production environment.  When we worked together, John was a reliable and dependable team member with high standards and the consummate professional.

references.name: Melinda Wynn Jackson
references.reference: I worked with John both when I was a Consulting Systems Engineer and later as a Product Manager. John was always a pleasure to work with, a strong customer focus and the tenacity to pursue any technical issue until he had the answer. If you have a problem to solve - put John on it.
